nodes.bodyText: I saw none of xxx DropFunctionStatement and this class has members, so what role does DropFunctionStatement play?

I saw none of xxx DropFunctionStatement and this class has members, so what role does DropFunctionStatement play?

@tristaZero DropFunctionStatement has two implementation classes——MySQLDropFunctionStatement and PostgreSQLDropFunctionStatement, and they have been included in PR.
Why do all of them have no members?  MySQLDropFunctionStatement and PostgreSQLDropFunctionStatement  will be filled with member variables later?

Why do all of them have no members? MySQLDropFunctionStatement and PostgreSQLDropFunctionStatement  will be filled with member variables later?

@tristaZero Yes, they will be optimized in #6498. Later, the table name in the statement will be parsed and the table will be verified.
